about_the_game:
The Original Soundtrack for Shadow Gambit: The Cursed Crew is available for download as MP3 and FLAC.

  • Features 60 captivating tracks heard in the game.
  • Over 160 minutes of high-quality music for your pirate pleasure.
  • Composed and produced by Filippo Beck Peccoz. Known for his masterful work on acclaimed soundtracks Shadow Tactics: Blades of the Shogun and Desperados III.

Please note that this soundtrack is additional content and does not include the base game.
